titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for the continuing of our farthing tokens of copper, and prohibiting the counterfeiting of them, and the vse of all other.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, printers to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: White-Hall, the thirtieth day of May, in the first yeere of our reigne ..
Arms 12; Steele notation: of and 2) end Our.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
